title: Trouble Changing Name
body: I'm trying to change my name to DepressedNasusMain (typed as shown) but it says "Unfortunately your desired name was not accepted. Please verify that it meets the requirements." I'm not sure what that means the name isn't offensive and there are no weird characters. Any help please?

replies.body: An interesting name, but unfortunately it's too long!  Per our [Summoner Name](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ) FAQ, names can't be longer than 16 characters.  Let me know if that clears things up!
That really helps Thanks alot! Now I just gotta find a synonym for Depressed lol.

Well, is he missing his bone?  BonelessNasus?  SaltyNasus?  Does Nasus invoke any other emotions?  Like PassiveFarmerNasus...does that even fit?  Creating a name is hard.  I'll spend the most amount of time in RPG's trying to figure out my character's name, so best of luck to you friend!
